resources.string: Helping You Reach Your Fitness Goals

Body Stats is a simple, quick way to record and view your measurements so you can monitor your progress. 


After you get your measurements from the doctor or your personal trainer, just enter them and save. 


Body Stats lists all your entries in an easy-to-read, dated list so you can easily see where you're making improvement.


Android's Future is dedicated to bringing you *useful* applications packed full of extra features similar apps omit.

who asked me to write an app to simply add her body measurements. She looked all through the Android Market but only found BMI calculators and other things that did everything except what she was looking for. Simple as it seemed, nothing existed. Once I got started, it took on a life of it own with more and more features being added as the app developed. \n\n
It is my sincere hope that this app serves you well and helps you achieve your fitness goals.

Entering stats can be emotionally daunting. But if you fill in just one field, we can start charting your progress.

 Touch the screen and let's try again :-)

Android\'s Future does not in any way promise or imply that you will loose weight or achieve any other specific fitness goal by using this applicaiton. \n\n Consult a physician before undertaking any diet or weight loss program.
